title: Ángel Uribe
text:
Ángel Uribe Sánchez, (29 September 1943 in <a href="Anc%C3%B3n%20District">Ancón</a>, <a href="Lima">Lima</a> – 17 October 2008 in Ancón Lima) was a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> player from <a href="Peru">Peru</a> who played his entire club career for <a href="Universitario%20de%20Deportes">Universitario de Deportes</a>. Uribe also played for the <a href="Peru%20national%20football%20team">Peru national team</a> on ten occasions between 1960 and 1967 He was part of Peru's squad at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
Uribe died of <a href="bone%20cancer">bone cancer</a> in October 2008.
